scripts.build: npm run build:assets && npm run build:js && npm run build:sass
scripts.build:legacy: npm run build:assets && npm run build:js:legacy && npm run build:sass
scripts.build:js:legacy: browserify -t [ babelify --global --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins transform-object-assign ] src/js/index.js -o dist/www/js/app.js --debug
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:sass & npm run watch:assets & npm run livereload
scripts.watch:legacy: npm run watch:js:legacy & npm run watch:sass & npm run watch:assets & npm run livereload
scripts.watch:js:legacy: watchify -t [ babelify --global --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins transform-object-assign ] -p browserify-hmr src/js/index.js -o dist/www/js/app.js --debug
scripts.start: npm run build && serve --path dist/www & npm run watch
scripts.start:cordova: npm run build:legacy && cd www & cordova run android
scripts.sync:gh: git checkout gh-pages && git rebase master && git push && git checkout master
